thread.title: Boys & Girls Clubs of Delaware hosts Masquerade Ball | Cape Gazette
thread.title_full: Boys & Girls Clubs of Delaware hosts Masquerade Ball | Cape Gazette

author: Ted Pfirrmann
title: Boys & Girls Clubs of Delaware hosts Masquerade Ball | Cape Gazette
text: The Boys & Girls Clubs of Delaware held its 10th annual Unmask a Child’s Future Masquerade Ball at the Lighthouse Cove Event Center in Dewey Beach. The event had live music from the Blue Label Band, live and silent auctions, and the opportunity to support the Boys & Girls Clubs of Sussex County. Honored at the event was Scott Kammerer, CEO of SoDel Concepts, who received the first Terry Megee Great Futures Award.
